channel.title: Web Client
channel.description:
Hi, I am new here although my account may be old... I don't log in much because I quit Runescape/Runescape private servers for a long time, but I'm back now. Now that we have established that - lets get on with it.
Hi, I am trying to make a Runescape web client for my "to be" server ( i know how to make a server I have made plenty in the past) but before iI make the server I'm wanting to make the web client... I need someone to help me make/code it into my website - * (id appreciate it if you signed up/made an account) on my site the web client will be located at * (IE or Opera is NOT compatible with the page at this time) please add me on MSN messenger: th3realj0k@live.com or you can just reply here... either way is fine. I know this post is complete copy pasta (meaning - attempting to use correct grammar/punctuation but completely failing at it) so yea... please help!

item.title: Web Client
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

you already have a topic on this in the client help section

Read full topic

item.title: Web Client
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Your error is:

Exception in thread "Thread-12" java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission C:\.Rs2Forum_file_store_32 read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.File.exists(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.findcachedir(signlink.java:243) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:50) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error connecting to server. java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://rs2forum.net/webclient/cache.zip at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3371) at client.method67(client.java:3466) at client.method6(client.java:6934) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4549) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: http://rs2forum.net/webclient/cache.zip at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldInt(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(Unknown Source) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3370) ... 5 more

item.title: Web Client

item.description:
@jesuslol1 wrote:

sorry guys, I was just in a bad mood from my sister… Thanks for the help anyways. The Ric tutorial is good but i messed up somwhere… can anyone tell me how to fix it? You can see my error here: http://www.rs2forum.net/webclient/client.php

Read full topic

item.title: Web Client
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

xxpkpurexx:

hmmmmm so he got the hormones frm his dad? or something really dont thinkso unless hes a lonley child like he said to me…

It has nothing to do with hormones, it would be a life-learned habit. Someone in his life may have cursed a lot while he was a kid, and he may have just adapted to it. It has nothing to do with anger management, or hormones.
Though, to fully answer the question to if he has anger management, or not, We would have to ask him ourselves.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 08:50:07 pm[/size][hr][quote=“I Yaa I, post:17, topic:307701”][quote author=xxpkpurexx link=topic=403852.msg2989879#msg2989879 date=1255229149]
hmmmmm so he got the hormones frm his dad? or something really dont thinkso unless hes a lonley child like he said to me…
[/quote]

Anger Management? I lol’d I have never talked to you in my life! I cuss so much because of the people i grew up with! I’m pretty sure you are handicapped, you offer 100 bucks for someone to add commands to a server for you, and yet you post in this section! You can’t do fucking shit! Now go to your little silabsoft you fucking dick![/quote]
I laughed really hard at this part:

[b]Now go to your little silabsoft you fucking dick![/b]

Read full topic

well if hes cursing at every single person that does mean angermangment imagine in every sentence or other word he says a curss word how isnt that angermangment…

i dont care if i get bannd ill just make a new account and if im IP bannd ill just proxy if they find away around that ill sock5 if i need to…
FUCK YOU[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 06:41:27 pm[/size][hr][quote=“GrimReapersScythe, post:5, topic:307701”][quote author=jesuslol1 link=topic=403852.msg2989638#msg2989638 date=1255220930]
Hi, I am new here although my account may be old… I don’t log in much because I quit Runescape/Runescape private servers for a long time, but I’m back now. Now that we have established that - lets get on with it.

Hi, I am trying to make a Runescape web client for my “to be” server ( i know how to make a server I have made plenty in the past) but before iI make the server I’m wanting to make the web client… I need someone to help me make/code it into my website - http://www.rs2forum.net (id appreciate it if you signed up/made an account) on my site the web client will be located at http://www.rs2forum.net/webclient/client-load.php (IE or Opera is NOT compatible with the page at this time)
please add me on MSN messenger: th3realj0k@live.com or you can just reply here… either way is fine. I know this post is complete copy pasta (meaning - attempting to use correct grammar/punctuation but completely failing at it) so yea… please help!
[/quote]
First off, don’t advertise, as it’s against the rules. Secondly, this section is for ‘Server Help’, not client. Third, if you would have checked the Client section, you would have found tutorials on how to do this.

Here:
Ric914’s Web Client tutorial[/quote]

Thanks, I love you (no homo).

Read full topic
